program.title: Program Overview

format.title: Self-Paced Learning

ai.title: Learn Faster with AI Support
ai.description: Our proprietary AI tools provide instant feedback, personalized guidance, and real-time code review to accelerate your learning journey.

rigobot.title: Rigobot AI Tutor
rigobot.description: Your personal AI coding assistant that reviews your code, helps with exercises, and provides instant feedback 24/7.
rigobot.example1: I'm stuck on this React component. Can you help?
rigobot.example2: I see the issue! Your useEffect is missing a dependency. Let me show you how to fix it...

learnpack.title: LearnPack Software
learnpack.description: Our custom learning platform with interactive exercises, automated tests, and instant feedback for every lesson.

mentorship.title: Mentorship & Support
mentorship.subtitle: You're never alone in your learning journey. Get help when you need it.

monthly.title: Monthly Sessions
monthly.description: Regular mentorship sessions with expert developers to guide your progress and answer questions.

private.title: 1-on-1 Sessions
private.description: Schedule private 45-minute sessions with mentors for personalized help on specific challenges.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join thousands of learners in our supportive community with daily live workshops and peer collaboration.

curriculum.title: Technologies You'll Master
curriculum.subtitle: Learn the most in-demand technologies used by professional developers worldwide
curriculum.extras: + APIs, Git, SQL, REST, and AI-powered development tools like Cursor & Copilot

certificate.title: Certificate & Career Network
certificate.description: Upon completion, receive a globally recognized certificate that opens doors to professional opportunities worldwide.

schedule.question: Are there fixed class times?
schedule.answer: No, the self-paced bootcamp is designed for learning at your own pace. You can access all materials 24/7 and progress through the curriculum whenever it suits you. Optional live workshops are available at various times if you want real-time interaction.

motivation.question: How do I stay motivated learning on my own?
motivation.answer: You're never truly alone! Our AI tools provide instant feedback, you have access to mentorship sessions, and our active community of learners is always available for support and collaboration. Many students find this combination keeps them more engaged than traditional classes.

experience.question: Do I need prior coding experience?
experience.answer: No prior experience is required. Our bootcamp starts with the fundamentals and teaches you everything from scratch. We focus on building a strong foundation before moving to advanced concepts.

mentoring.question: How do I schedule mentoring sessions?
mentoring.answer: Simply go to your dashboard, select the mentorship service, choose your preferred mentor, and pick a day and time that works for you. Each session is 45 minutes and can be used for any topic you need help with.

certificate.question: Is the certificate recognized by employers?
certificate.answer: Yes! Our certificate is recognized by employers worldwide. We're licensed by the Florida Department of Education and have been featured by Forbes, Newsweek, and Course Report as one of the top coding bootcamps.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Tech Career?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of graduates who have transformed their careers with 4Geeks.

hero.title: Career Development
hero.subtitle: for the AI Era
hero.description: Get unlimited 1:1 career support designed for your unique profile and goals—for life. From resume and portfolio building to interviews and AI-driven hiring platforms, we'll give you the personalized mentorship you need to land your first job and keep thriving in today's tech.

unlimitedSupport.title: Unlimited Career Support – Always Ahead of Job Market Trends
unlimitedSupport.description: Geekforce is built into every 4Geeks program to make sure you don't just learn tech, but launch a successful career. Through unlimited 1:1 mentorship and group coaching, you'll gain insights, resources, and strategies designed to keep you ahead in the AI-powered job market.
unlimitedSupport.feature1: Receive tailored guidance aligned with your goals, context, and challenges.
unlimitedSupport.feature2: Meet mentors online or in-person whenever you need support—unlimited, for life.
unlimitedSupport.feature3: Access proven tools and strategies to make smarter career moves and stay relevant as the tech industry evolves.

hyperpersonalized.title: Accelerate Your Results with Hyperpersonalized Career Support
hyperpersonalized.subtitle: Combine unlimited 1:1 human mentorship with AI-powered tools to launch your career faster and smarter:
hyperpersonalized.feature1: Rigobot, our custom AI, gives instant feedback on your resume, portfolio, and projects.
hyperpersonalized.feature2: Practice technical interviews and behavioral questions with AI-guided exercises.
hyperpersonalized.feature3: Get expert coaching from our mentors who tailor advice to your unique profile and goals.

stats.title: Does Our Career Support Deliver Results You Can Count On?

testimonials.title: Real Careers Start Here — Just Ask Our Students

Student reviews and career results speak for themselves: You'll leave with the technical skills, confidence, and career strategy to break into one of tech's most rewarding fields—and keep growing.

whosHiring.title: Who's Hiring Our Graduates?
whosHiring.subtitle: Our alumni work at top companies around the world
whosHiring.description: From startups to Fortune 500 companies, 4Geeks graduates are making an impact across industries. Our career support and strong employer network help you land roles at leading tech companies, agencies, and enterprises globally.

careerProcess.title: Get Hired with Our 3-Step Career Development Process
careerProcess.subtitle: Once you've mastered the technical skills, our structured process helps you build a lasting career in tech — taking you from learning to landing the job.

step1.title: 1. Profile Optimization
step1.item1: Polish LinkedIn, GitHub, and portfolio to attract recruiters and pass AI-based filters.
step1.item2: Build a resume that clears applicant tracking systems (ATS) and highlights your strengths.
step1.item3: Showcase your skills with a recruiter-ready portfolio.

step2.title: 2. Interview Preparation
step2.item1: Gain confidence with mock technical and behavioral interviews.
step2.item2: Practice coding and problem-solving with auto-graded exercises.
step2.item3: Develop tailored strategies for upcoming interviews.

step3.title: 3. Strategic Job Search
step3.item1: Create a personalized job search plan aligned with your goals.
step3.item2: Navigate AI-driven hiring platforms, from resume scanners to automated interviews.
step3.item3: Connect with our extensive network of global hiring partners.

confidence.benefit1: Our program's effectiveness is backed by strong placement rates
confidence.benefit2: The tech industry continues to grow with high demand for talent
confidence.benefit3: We believe in our teaching approach and your commitment to succeed
confidence.imageAlt: Happy graduate with laptop showing the 4Geeks Academy logo

refund.title: How the Refund Works
refund.description: We've made it simple: if you complete all the required steps, and you don't land a qualifying job within 9 months after graduation, we'll refund 100% of your tuition.
refund.step1: 1. You were not hired into a qualifying role within 9 months of graduation.
refund.step2: 2. Our team verifies that you met all Job Guarantee requirements
refund.step3: 3. Receive the full refund within 30 days.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about the Job Guarantee

q1.question: How does the 4Geeks Academy Job Guarantee work?
q1.answer: Our Job Guarantee ensures that if you meet all program requirements and still don't get a qualifying tech job within 9 months of graduation, you are eligible for a full refund of your tuition. It's our way of backing the real-world outcomes our bootcamp delivers. Conditions apply.

q2.question: Does the Job Guarantee refund the full tuition if I don't get hired?
q2.answer: Yes. If you qualify for the Job Guarantee and don't receive a qualifying job offer within the job search window, you'll receive a full tuition refund.

q3.question: How long do I have to look for a job before the refund is issued?
q3.answer: You'll have up to 9 months after graduating to secure qualifying employment. If you meet all requirements and are still not hired within that time, you can apply for a full refund.

q4.question: What kinds of jobs count toward the Job Guarantee?
q4.answer: Full-time or contract positions in tech (such as software development, QA, or related roles) qualify. Remote jobs and freelance positions may be eligible depending on terms.

q5.question: Is there a minimum salary for jobs that count?
q5.answer: There is no set salary threshold, but the job must be aligned with the skills taught in the program and be a legitimate entry-level tech role.

q6.question: What do I need to do to qualify for the Job Guarantee?
q6.answer: You must: Complete 100% of coursework and projects, attend sessions consistently, follow the steps our career services team advises, actively apply to jobs and document your search, and hold valid U.S. work authorization.

q7.question: Do I need to have work authorization to qualify?
q7.answer: Yes, you must have valid U.S. work authorization to be eligible for the Job Guarantee.

q8.question: Is attendance important for the Job Guarantee?
q8.answer: Yes, maintaining good attendance throughout the bootcamp is mandatory for eligibility.

q9.question: What coursework or projects must I complete?
q9.answer: You'll need to finish your final project in a satisfactory manner, plus all assigned coding projects, exercises, and coursework provided during the bootcamp.

q10.question: What does it mean to follow the career team's guidance?
q10.answer: It includes completing your resume and portfolio according to our guidelines, participating in mock interviews, and applying to a minimum number of jobs weekly — all with the support of our career services team.

q11.question: Can I finance the additional $2,000 Job Guarantee fee with my tuition?
q11.answer: Yes, in many cases the Job Guarantee fee can be bundled into your overall tuition financing plan.

q12.question: Is the Job Guarantee available for all courses?
q12.answer: No — it is currently only available for select bootcamps, including the Full Stack Development program. Please check your program's eligibility.

q13.question: What's the average time it takes for 4Geeks grads to get hired?
q13.answer: Most 4Geeks Academy graduates find a job within 90 to 180 days of completing the bootcamp, depending on their location, dedication, and prior experience.

q14.question: If I'm offered a contract job, does it count toward the guarantee?
q14.answer: Yes, contract jobs can qualify if they are relevant to the bootcamp training and meet our minimum standards for legitimacy and compensation.
